title: No, ABP News Didn’t Blame Congress for Chandrayaan-2 Setback
subtitle: Indian News Channel  ABP News Viral Photo Fact Check: An image of ABP prime time show “Masterstroke’ hosted by anchor Rubika Liyaquat, is being circulated on social media which blames the Congress party for the Chandrayaan-2 setback.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
An image of Hindi news channel ABP’s prime time show ‘Masterstroke’, hosted by anchor Rubika Liyaquat, is being circulated on social media, which blames the Congress party for the Chandrayaan-2 setback.

Several social media users including Piyush Mishra, national spokesperson and media head of Suheldev Bharatiya Samaj Party (SBSP) and Preeti Chobey of the Samajwadi Party (SP) have shared the promo image.
